name: galactic-wallet
description: Galactic smart wallet for Sui blockchain
author: Brandon Arbuthnot

scripts.build:dev: npm run build:core && npm run build:zklogin && npm run inject
scripts.build:shell: BUILD_TARGET=shell vite build && mv dist-temp-shell/sui-sdk-shell.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-shell
scripts.build:core: BUILD_TARGET=core vite build && mv dist-temp-core/sui-sdk-core.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-core
scripts.build:transaction: BUILD_TARGET=transaction vite build && mv dist-temp-transaction/sui-sdk-transaction.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-transaction
scripts.build:advanced: BUILD_TARGET=advanced vite build && mv dist-temp-advanced/sui-sdk-advanced.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-advanced
scripts.build:zklogin: BUILD_TARGET=zklogin vite build && mv dist-temp-zklogin/zklogin-helpers.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-zklogin
scripts.build:tiered: npm run build:shell && npm run build:core && npm run build:transaction && npm run build:advanced && npm run build:zklogin && npm run inject
scripts.circuit-build: cd circuits && echo 'ðŸ”§ Compiling zkLogin circuit...' && circom2 zklogin.circom --r1cs --wasm -o build && echo 'ðŸ”‘ Generating proving keys...' && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 13 build/pot13_0000.ptau -v && echo 'galactic-zklogin-entropy-$(date +%s)' | snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot13_0000.ptau build/pot13_0001.ptau --name='Galactic zkLogin' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot13_0001.ptau build/pot13_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup build/zklogin.r1cs build/pot13_final.ptau build/zklogin_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/zklogin_0000.zkey build/verification_key.json && echo 'ðŸ“‹ Copying circuit files to public/...' && cp build/zklogin_js/zklogin.wasm ../public/ && cp build/zklogin_0000.zkey ../public/zklogin.zkey && cp build/verification_key.json ../public/ && echo 'âœ… Circuit build complete!'
